mapper.select: select * from employee join department using(dept_code) join job using(job_code) where emp_id = #{empId} and emp_status='Y'
mapper.update: update employee set postcode = #{postcode}, address=#{empAdd}, address_dt=#{empAddDetail}, emp_email=#{email}, emp_phone=#{phone} where emp_id=#{empId}
mapper.select: SELECT ATT_DATE,EMP_ID,START_TIME,END_TIME,AT_TYPE FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE EMP_ID=#{empId} and ATT_DATE=(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.update: update attendance set END_TIME=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24:MI'), AT_TYPE=case when (SUBSTR(start_time, 1,2) <9 and TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24')>=18) then 0 when (SUBSTR(START_TIME, 1,2)>=9 AND SUBSTR(START_TIME,1,2)<13 AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24')>18) then 1 when ((SUBSTR(START_TIME,1,2)>=9 AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24')<13) OR (SUBSTR(START_TIME,1,2)>=9 AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24')<18) OR(SUBSTR(START_TIME,1,2)>13 AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24')<18) OR(SUBSTR(START_TIME,1,2)<=9 AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24')<18) OR(SUBSTR(START_TIME,1,2)>13 AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24')>18)) then 2 end where EMP_ID=#{empId} AND ATT_DATE=(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'))

SELECT EMP_ID ,EMP_NAME ,JOB_NAME,DEPT_NAME,ATT_DATE,START_TIME,END_TIME,AT_TYPE FROM EMPLOYEE JOIN DEPARTMENT USING (DEPT_CODE) JOIN JOB USING (JOB_CODE) JOIN ATTENDANCE USING (EMP_ID) WHERE 1=1
and emp_name=#{empName}
AND DEPT_CODE IS NOT NULL
AND DEPT_CODE='1001'
AND DEPT_CODE='1002'
and att_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
order by att_date desc
